Text: Is this book about a russian male prostitute?

Thanks, Nighted. BTW, for those who enjoy colorful old films, this was a great movie (in color) with Robert Taylor and Elizabeth Taylor (probably at her most beautiful). Still available from Netflix or Blockbuster (or even, dare I say, TPB - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4496349/Ivanhoe.(1952)_Elizabeth_Taylor.avi)
